document_data.name: The Bold Blazon
document_data.mainbody: '''The Bold Blazon''' was a club in [[Suzail]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Interior: In {{yearlink|1479}}, the center stage was reduced to make room for additional tables.
document_data.History:
The Blue Flame, a dancer (actually [[Amarune Whitewave]], projected and distorted by the spells of the fugitive [[wizard]], [[Elminster Aumar]]) announced in advance a performance in that club during the [[Festival of Handras]] in the late {{yearlinkName|1479}}, despite never contacting the owner. This led said owner to become somewhat worried; he contacted the [[War Wizards]] to see to additional security, as the security he hired kept accepting bribes from the nobles intending to attend.

An altercation resulted from the convergence of numerous murderous [[blueflame ghost]]s, sent by [[Cymmarra]] and Lord [[Calantar (Lord)|Calantar]] during the performance.
document_data.Services: The place catered to jaded young nobles and their socially ambitious entourage. Amongst others, [[Maerclorn Wintersun]] and [[Kathkote Dawntard]] were known regulars.
